TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HostExecutionContextManager extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides the functionality that allows a common language runtime host to participate in the flow, or migration, of the execution context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Se atual <xref:System.AppDomainManager> tem uma referência a um <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager> no seu <xref:System.AppDomainManager.HostExecutionContextManager%2A> propriedade e, em seguida, o common language runtime chama o Gerenciador de sempre que uma chamada para o <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método ocorre, para permitir que o host participar no fluxo de execução contexto.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.HostExecutionContext Capture() cil managed
Public Overridable Function Capture () As HostExecutionContext
abstract member Capture : unit -> System.Threading.HostExecutionContext override this.Capture : unit -> System.Threading.HostExecutionContext

Docs.summary: Captures the host execution context from the current thread.
Docs.returns: A object representing the host execution context of the current thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> é criado usando um identificador seguro que contém o `IUnknown` ponteiro para o host de execução do thread atual.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Revert(object previousState) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub Revert (previousState As Object)
abstract member Revert : obj -> unit override this.Revert : obj -> unit

Docs.param: The previous context state to revert to.
Docs.summary: Restores the host execution context to its prior state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `previousState` deve ser o objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A> método.

Docs.exception: is . -or- was not created on the current thread. -or- is not the last state for the .
Docs.permission: Requer confiança total para o chamador imediato. Este membro não pode ser usado pelo código transparente ou parcialmente confiável.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object SetHostExecutionContext(class System.Threading.HostExecutionContext hostExecutionContext) cil managed
abstract member SetHostExecutionContext : System.Threading.HostExecutionContext -> obj override this.SetHostExecutionContext : System.Threading.HostExecutionContext -> obj

Docs.summary: Sets the current host execution context to the specified host execution context.
Docs.returns: An object for restoring the to its previous state.

remarks.format:
## Remarks O <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A> método define o contexto de execução do host atual <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>. Um <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> que foi usado como argumento para outra <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A> chamada de método não pode ser passada como parâmetro para este método. Em vez disso, use o <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext.CreateCopy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método para criar uma cópia de um <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> de objeto e, em seguida, usar a cópia para definir o contexto de execução do host.
Chamar o <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.Revert%2A> método usando o objeto retornado por este método para restaurar o <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> para seu estado anterior.

Docs.exception: was not acquired through a capture operation. -or- has been the argument to a previous method call.
Docs.permission: Requer confiança total para o chamador imediato. Este membro não pode ser usado pelo código transparente ou parcialmente confiável.
